benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/tags - Add tags to payment

covered: Valid Payload scenarios covered (TC01, TC02, TC03)
Invalid Payload scenarios covered (TC08, TC09, TC10, TC16)
Duplicate submissions handled and idempotency verified (TC11, TC19)
Validation scenarios covered (invalid tag UUIDs, malformed input, nulls, extra fields) (TC06, TC09, TC16, TC17, TC10)
gaps: Rate limiting tests for POST are missing
Caching behavior / headers not tested for POST
Potential misalignment in missing-authorization header status code (tests use 400 vs guideline 401/403)
Edge case: empty request body not explicitly tested
recommendations: Add rate-limiting tests to verify throughput and behavior under bursts
Add tests for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) on POST responses
Align missing authorization header status codes with guidelines (prefer 401/403) or adjust guidelines accordingly
Add test for empty request body
Test extremely large payloads beyond maximum to verify input validation and error handling
Expand concurrency tests to ensure idempotency under high contention
